text: Khawale inruoiya kei iminriang kasapngai, kei'n nangnile nileiomsuomlai ningni'n kachong ningjui angnga, hiwaneek ah kathachu kei'n nangnile inlaak-ah kaom kaalkhan kachong ningjuikha kheella areiom. Halli ningni'n kachi khat-um intuulle inruoiya nangni sanminringna kha puimintung nasik-ah song-inlang omru.
